com.cigital.insecurepay.common

Class CookieList

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cigital.insecurepay.common.CookieList

  • public class CookieList
extends java.lang.Object
    CookieList is class that handles everything related to cookies.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      CookieList()
      CookieList is the default constructor of this class.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCookie(CookieWrapper cookieWrapperObj)
      addCookie is a function that is called to add CookieWrapper object to the cookieArrayList.
      javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie allotCookie(java.lang.String custUserName, int custNo)
      allotCookie is a function that is called when a cookie needs to be assigned to a user.
      javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie createCookie(java.lang.String custUserName)
      createCookie is a function that is called to generate a NewCookie for the user.
      void deleteExpiredCookies()
      deleteCookies is a function that is called when expired cookies need to be deleted.
      java.lang.String displayCookies()
      displayCookie is a function that displays the cookieArrayList elements.
      CookieWrapper findCookie(javax.ws.rs.core.Cookie cookieObj)
      findCookie is a function used to find the matching cookie from the cookieArrayList.
      boolean updateCustNo(javax.ws.rs.core.Cookie cookieObj, int custNo)
      updateCustNo is a function that updates the corresponding custNo for the incoming cookie.

    • Constructor Detail

      • CookieList

        public CookieList()

    • Method Detail

      • allotCookie

        public javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie allotCookie(java.lang.String custUserName,
                                              int custNo)
        allotCookie is a function that is called when a cookie needs to be assigned to a user. It checks if a cookie exists that can be reassigned, otherwise a new cookie is created.
        Parameters:
        custUserName - Contains the customer's username.
        custNo - Contains the customer number.
        Returns:
        NewCookie An existing cookie or a new cookie is returned as a Newcookie object.

      • createCookie

        public javax.ws.rs.core.NewCookie createCookie(java.lang.String custUserName)
        createCookie is a function that is called to generate a NewCookie for the user.
        Parameters:
        custUserName - Contains the customer's username.
        Returns:
        NewCookie Return the NewCookie object created.

      • addCookie

        public void addCookie(CookieWrapper cookieWrapperObj)
        addCookie is a function that is called to add CookieWrapper object to the cookieArrayList.
        Parameters:
        cookieWrapperObj - Contains the CookieWrapper object that contains the cookie.

      • deleteExpiredCookies

        public void deleteExpiredCookies()
        deleteCookies is a function that is called when expired cookies need to be deleted.

      • findCookie

        public CookieWrapper findCookie(javax.ws.rs.core.Cookie cookieObj)
        findCookie is a function used to find the matching cookie from the cookieArrayList.
        Parameters:
        cookieObj - Contains the cookie received from the client.
        Returns:
        CookieWrapper Return the CookieWrapper object that matches the cookie.

      • updateCustNo

        public boolean updateCustNo(javax.ws.rs.core.Cookie cookieObj,
                            int custNo)
        updateCustNo is a function that updates the corresponding custNo for the incoming cookie.
        Parameters:
        cookieObj - Contains the cookie received from the client
        custNo - Contains the current client's custNo
        Returns:
        boolean Returns if the cookieObj was successfully updated.

      • displayCookies

        public java.lang.String displayCookies()
        displayCookie is a function that displays the cookieArrayList elements.
